Up loader uploads torrent. start seeding...

after adding every new lecher the downloading speed goes down...

after completing more that one seed it will increase...

you can see it in your utorent .

in the peers windows you can see that when there is only single seeder every lechers get data directly from him.

utorrent use a request download way...

every lecher request directly to seeder and when he is connected , another person download speed goes down,.

globe torrent speed comes high when only 10 lechers but globe is very popular up loader so, lechers connected very fast... and Now globe torrent software give data to them also...

so speed goes down...

after few hours...

now speed comes maximum....

To: globeplus
The game runs fine but is missing a lot of textures. All I can see is the water (at the first level), the smoke, sparks, fire and rain. Other textures were missing and I also see some circles, walls and the ground with "Release Me" written on it. I updated everything (drivers, graphics card, direct x) but still it's the same. Also, the high spec tweak pack didn't helped either. I tried all the levels but it's still the same. Tried restarting my computer, reinstalled (unpack) the game also didn't helped me playing this beta. I appreciated your work but can you please help me? I'd buy the game when it comes out but I want to see it first before I'll buy the game. I know this is just a beta and isn't in a stable state of game experience. I also expected that there will be bugs, glitches etc. but is there a way to work around with it? I'll will appreciate your help and thanks in advance.

My specs
Processor: AMD Athlon X2 245 2.4Ghz
Memory: 2GB
Graphics Card: ATI Radeon HD 4350 2GB
